name: Don't Forget About Me
description:
Travel back to your childhood in this ARPG  filled with magic and monsters. You still remember what that feels like right? 

Two friends awaken to see they have finally gained their magical birthright. Help these pals explore the mystical forest while fighting off monsters and earning spells. 

A hybrid platformer ARPG that allows for a unique handheld adventure! Level up, upgrade gear, find secrets, and more in this bite sized adventure.

Controls:

GameboyKeyboardInteractAZAttackBXMovementD-padWASD/ArrowsCombat MenuSelectC/ShiftStart MenuStartEnter

The Rom and the Pocket versions of the game can be downloaded below. Running it on EZ-Flash I've had issues with saving so make sure you exit out of the game before turning off.
